Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short dress in an airy weave made from a viscose blend. Wide, gathered neckline, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Long, wide, cuffed sleeves, and a gathered seam at the knees for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
